sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-main>
      <router-view :key="$route.fullPath"/>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>

export default {
  name: 'App',

  components: { HomeView, AboutView },
  mounted() {
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if (e.isTrusted) {
        this.$refs.au.play()
      }
    })
  },

  data() {
    return {
      home: true,
      about: false,
    };
  },
};
</script>
